node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"When working with gold, it is important to respect the curves outlined by the designer." Admire the succession of exacting gestures performed by the jeweler on the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"When I look at the finished piece, I feel proud of my work because this type of jewel is one of the kind."
Follow the meticulous steps of Van Cleef & Arpels' polisher hidden behind the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"Selecting the raw stones that will serve to carve out the caps is the lapidary's foremost challenge."
Meet Constance, expert colored stone buyer of the Maison, and explore the challenges faced when selecting the ornamental stones for the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
“Dance brings all the artistic disciplines together … it is a fascinating art form and an incredible field of expression.” Serge Laurent, Van Cleef & Arpels' Dance and Cultural Program Manager.

Devotee of dance ever since its origins, Van Cleef & Arpels aims to promote the choreographic heritage, encourage contemporary creation and raise the profile of this artistic universe among the public at large.

Listen to Nicolas Bos, CEO of Van Cleef & Arpels and Serge Laurent, to learn more about the Dance Reflections initiative.
#VCADanceReflections #VCAdance #VanCleefArpels

node.title: Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels

node.text:
Sound on!
Since its foundation in 1906, Van Cleef & Arpels has always had a constant fascination with depicting the sky and stars. Listen to our video podcast and dive into the High Jewelry collection Sous les étoiles, at the crossroads of reality and abstraction...
 
#VCASouslesEtoiles #HighJewelry #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Van Cleef & Arpels has collaborated with astrophysicist Isabelle Grenier, to bring a scientific dimension to the Sous les étoiles collection.
 
Watch this IGTV to learn more about this collaboration, that brought forth a High Jewelry collection tinged with dreams.
 
#VCASouslesEtoiles #HighJewelry #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
The depictions offered over the centuries by enthralled astronomers, writers and artists have fuelled the imagination of the Maison’s designers, expert gemologists and craftsmen to create the collection Sous les étoiles.
 
Watch the IGTV and explore the Sous les étoiles High Jewelry collection introduced by Nicolas Bos, CEO and Artistic Director of the Maison.
 
#VCASouslesEtoiles #HighJewelry #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Did you ever wonder how Van Cleef & Arpels' creations are crafted, and by whom?
 
Filmmaker @loicprigent invites you into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops to introduce you to the Mains d'Or, the craftsmen who work together to give birth to Van Cleef & Arpels' wonders.
 
"When I was little, I was obsessed by it. The only job I wanted to do when I'd grow up was polisher."
 
Discover more about the talent of a polisher at Van Cleef & Arpels, and listen to one of the Maison's craftsmen share this unique savoir-faire.
 
#VCAHighJewelry #VCAtogether #VCAsavoirfaire #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Did you ever wonder how Van Cleef & Arpels' creations are crafted, and by whom?

Filmmaker @loicprigent invites you into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops to introduce you to the Mains d'Or, the craftsmen who work together to give birth to Van Cleef & Arpels' wonders.

 "Each stone-setter has his own technique, because we all learned in a different way."

Discover more about the talent of a Gem setter at Van Cleef & Arpels, and listen to one of the Maison's craftsmen share this unique savoir-faire.

#VCAHighJewelry #VCAtogether #VCAsavoirfaire #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Did you ever wonder how Van Cleef & Arpels' creations are crafted, and by whom?
 
Filmmaker @loicprigent invites you into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops to introduce you to the Mains d'Or, the craftsmen who work together to give birth to Van Cleef & Arpels' wonders.
 
"This technique dates back to the 1930s. It was a real revolution at the time and there hasn't been a better technique invented since."
 
Discover more about the talent of a Mystery Set specialist at Van Cleef & Arpels, and listen to one of the Maison's craftsmen share this unique savoir-faire.
#VCAHighJewelry #VCAtogether #VCAsavoirfaire #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
For its 50th anniversary, the @festivaldautomne is promising unprecedented artistic collaborations, several world premieres, eclectic itineraries featuring French and international artists, as well as four extraordinary portraits including one dedicated to Gisèle Vienne, produced thanks to the support of Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels.

#VCADanceReflections #VCADance#VanCleefArpels

Details:
Portrait of Gisèle Vienne, photo credit: Patric Chiha

📍Kindertotenlieder – Gisèle Vienne
> Centre Pompidou, 06 – 09 October
Photo credit: Mathilde Darel

📍Crowd – Gisèle Vienne
> MC93, 15 – 18 December
Photo credit: Estelle Hanania

📍This is how you will disappear – Gisèle Vienne
> MAC – Maison des Arts de Créteil, 06 – 08 January 2022
Photo credit: Seldon Hunt

node.text:
In 2021, Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels is supporting the 50th annual @festivaldautomne à Paris to produce and stage performances that express the richness of international choreographic creation.  As prime sponsor of the Festival, Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels also contributes to the civic initiatives developed by the Festival d’Automne à Paris.
#VCADanceReflections #VCAdance #VanCleefArpels

Details of the performances:

📍Trisha Brown x 100 – Conservatoire de Paris
> La Vilette, 03 – 04 December
Photo credit: Ferrante Ferranti

📍Lavagem – Alice Ripoll
> La Vilette, 15/09 - 19/09
> Théâtre Louis Aragon de Tremblay-en-France, 15 – 16 October
Photo credit: Renato Mangolin

📍Múa – Emmannuelle huynh
> CND – Centre National de la Danse, 18 – 20 November
Photo credit: Jean-Baptiste Huynh

📍Drumming Live – Anne Teresa De Keersmaeker
> La Villette, 09 – 12 December
Photo credit: Anne Van Aerschot

📍Bach 6 solo –Robert Wilson, Lucinda Childs & Jennifer Koh
> Chapelle Saint-Louis de la Salpêtrière, 03 – 16 September
Photo credit: Lucie Jansch, Juergen Frank

node.text:
A devotee of dance ever since its origins, the Maison is today strengthening its commitment to the arts with Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels.
Guided by the values of creation, transmission and education, this initiative aims to uphold the artists and institutions that showcase the modern and contemporary choreographic repertoire, while encouraging new productions. This year again, Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels is supporting the 50th annual @festivaldautomne à Paris.

#VCADanceReflections #VCAdance #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
[HERITAGE COLLECTION: Dive into the past to unveil vintage pieces.]
 
🔎 Floral themes remain a constant source of inspiration throughout Van Cleef & Arpels' history as many of the Maison's most significant creations have been inspired by nature.
 
Enthralled by the constant metamorphoses of flora and fauna, the Maison creates pieces that echo the blooming of flowers and the lushness of gardens. The vibrant hues of gemstones serve to reflect the vitality of nature and the rhythm of the seasons.
 
Follow us on @VCAheritage to learn more about Van Cleef & Arpels' Heritage creations.
 
#VCAheritage #VCAHeritageStory #VCAHeritageIndianInspiration #VCAHeritageFlora #VCAHeritageYellowGold  #VCAHeritage1960s #VCAHeritage1970s #PreciousStones #Emeralds #Rubies #Diamonds #Flowers #VCAarchives #VanCleefArpels

Photo shared by Van Cleef & Arpels on August 31, 2021 tagging @vcaheritage. May be an image of jewelry and text that says 'Indian inspiration Ornamental stones'.

node.text:
[HERITAGE COLLECTION: Dive into the past to unveil vintage pieces.]
 
🔎 Redolent of the 1970s' taste for Indian-inspired designs, the bold color combination is likely inspired by the Arpels brothers' travels to India, where Maharajas showed them fabulous collections, from which they brought back incredible stones and jewels.
 
This era's fashion focused on a variety of unique and exotic materials featuring vibrant stones and organic materials such as coral allowing the pieces to be worn from day-to-night for a variety of occasions.⠀
 
Follow us on @VCAheritage to learn more about Van Cleef & Arpels' Heritage creations.
 
#VCAheritage #VCAHeritageStory #VCAHeritageIndianInspiration #VCAHeritageYellowGold #VCAHeritageOrnementalStones #VCAHeritage1970s #PreciousStones #Coral #Amethyst #Chrysoprase #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
[HERITAGE COLLECTION: Dive into the past to unveil vintage pieces.]
 
🔎 In the late 1960s, Van Cleef & Arpels' jewelry broke free of traditional references and was more stylistically diverse. Inspired by dream-like Indian jewelry, Van Cleef & Arpels created pieces that included precious colored stones such as emeralds and rubies.
The intricate patterns and colors of these creations echo vibrant Hindu paintings and textiles.
 
💡 Inside secret: In the 1950s, Claude Arpels acquired certain pieces from the Maharajah of Rewa's collection.
 
Follow us on @VCAheritage to learn more about Van Cleef & Arpels' Heritage creations.
 
#VCAheritage #VCAHeritageStory #VCAHeritageIndianInspiration #VCAHeritagePreciousStones #VCAHeritageColoredStones #VCAHeritage1960s #VCAHeritage1970s #PreciousStones #Emeralds #Diamonds #Rubies #VCAarchives #VanCleefArpels

node.text:
Dive into Van Cleef & Arpels' workshops and listen to the Maison's Mains d'Or share their unique savoir-faire.
 
"Selecting the raw stones that will serve to carve out the caps is the lapidary's foremost challenge."
Meet Constance, expert colored stone buyer of the Maison, and explore the challenges faced when selecting the ornamental stones for the Bouton d'or ballerina clip.
 
Discover more about Van Cleef & Arpels craftsmen's expertise and the Bouton d'or collection in the Maison's IGTV channel.
 
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance #VCACraftsmanship #Craftsmanship

node.text:
A ballet of colors.
The radiant and intense blue hues of turquoise and lapis lazuli interspersed with sparkling diamonds reflect against the warmth of yellow gold.
#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli

node.text:
Inspired by the Maison's heritage, the Bouton d’or collection welcomes a new creation: the ballerina clip. The juxtaposition of yellow gold, turquoise and lapis-lazuli paillettes on her costume reveal all the expertise of Van Cleef & Arpels.

#VCAboutondor #VanCleefArpels #VCAturquoise #VCAyellowgold #VCAlapislazuli #VCAdance
